descriptionHtml:
[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ffd966][size=5]
Description:[/size][/color][/font]
[color=#e06666][size=3]This mod replaced Vex, Sapphire and Brynjolf in Thieves Guild; Astrid in Dark Brotherhood(even the dead body) and Ulfric Stormcloak from beginning to end.If you don't mind Astrid seems like such a pretty young lady or the youngest Ulfric you never imagined before, then you'll enjoy my work.[/size][/color]

[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#dbb0a7][size=3]2015-10-24:
Add a patch which can fix broken mouth.[/size][/color][/font]

[color=#ffd966][size=4]Installation: [/size][/color][color=#e06666]Use the Nexus Mod Manager to install or copy all content to the Skyrim/Data folder
[/color][color=#ffd966][size=3]
Uninstallation:[/size][size=3] [/size][/color][color=#e06666]Uncheck the esp plugin,delete all files that came with my mod or uninstall using NMM[/color]


[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#c27ba0][size=4]Credits:[/size][/color][/font]
[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#a64d79][size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/?]Caliente's Beautiful Bodies Edition -CBBE[/url]-by Ousnius and Caliente
